verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Happy day, happy day, newline When Jesus washed my sins away! newline He taught me how to watch and pray, newline And live rejoicing every day.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O happy day that fixed my choice newline On Thee, my Savior and my God! newline Well may this glowing heart rejoice, newline And tell its raptures all abroad.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Tis done, the great transaction's done; newline I am my Lord's and He is mine. newline He drew me and I followed on, newline Charmed to confess the voice divine.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Now rest, my long divided heart; newline Fixed on this blissful center; rest; newline Nor ever from my Lord depart, newline With Him of every good possessed.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O happy bond that seals my vows newline To Him who merits all my love! newline Let cheerful anthems fill His house, newline While to that sacred shrine I move.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: High heaven, that heard the solemn vow, newline That vow renewed shall daily hear, newline Till in life's latest hour I bow newline And bless in death a bond so dear.
